sentences.en: 'I'll never smoke again!'' Yeah? Go tell that to the marines.'
sentences.cn: “ 我再也不抽烟了! ” “ 是 吗 ?骗鬼去吧. ”

sentences.en: "Have they been to visit you yet?" — "Just the once, yeah."
sentences.cn: “他们来看过你吗?”——“来过,就一次.”

sentences.en: "Hello, is this Raymond Brown?"— 'Yeah. who's this.'
sentences.cn: “喂，是雷蒙德·布朗吗？”——“对，您是哪位？”

sentences.en: "I think you're being paranoid." — "Yeah. I guess so."
sentences.cn: 我认为你太多疑了。”——“是啊，我也是这样认为。”
“这是一次非常棒的机会。”——“是，我知道。”

sentences.en: "Shall I give you a ring on Friday?" — "Yeah okay."
sentences.cn: “我星期五给你打电话好吗？”——“好的。”

sentences.en: "We're all talking at the same time." — "Yeah. Sorry."
He said "vegetarians unite", and I looked at him and said "yeah, ha ha".
sentences.cn: “我行我‘素’，”他说道，我瞅着他，说：“随你喽，呵呵。”

sentences.en: His mother was murdered. Yeah, she got whacked. Snuffed out.
sentences.cn: 他母亲是被谋杀的。是的，是被人干掉的，弄死的。

sentences.en: Is that the right way up? — Yeah. I suppose so.
sentences.cn: 这是上去的路吗？——是的，我想是。

sentences.en: When I finished, he said, "Yeah. That figures"
sentences.cn: 等我说完，他说道：“是啊，那是预料中事。”
